Ok finally got it working.  Here is what I did:

1. Mount Image and Install
2. Download 1.61 Patch and install
3. Go to Gamecopyworld and get the 1.61 nocd crack (pcg-ec61.rar), the old crack had a bug where the game would crash after 10 turns.
4. Play

Do NOT replace the binkw32.dll file. That whole avenue is a waste of time.  If you have replaced the file you need to uninstall before starting step 1 above.
